Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: ( SELECT * FROM dbo.appointment where DATEPART(DAYOFYEAR,timings)=237 AND did=3 )

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value:
CREATE FUNCTION [dbo].[Function12] (
) RETURNS TABLE AS RETURN

Property.Name: BodyScript
Property.Value: ( SELECT * FROM dbo.prescription WHERE pid=@pid AND did=@did )

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: ( SELECT SUM(charge) as sum_day FROM dbo.appointment WHERE DATEPART(DAYOFYEAR,timings)=@day )

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: ( SELECT SUM(charge) as sum_month FROM dbo.appointment WHERE DATEPART(MONTH,timings)=@month )

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT into dbo.patient(pid,sex,name,address,age,did) values(@pid,@sex,@name,@address,@age,@did); RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT into dbo.appointment(anum,timings,charge,did) values(@anum,@timings,@charge,@did); RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: INSERT into dbo.prescription(pid,did,prescription) values(@pid,@did,@prescription); RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: UPDATE dbo.appointment SET timings=@timings WHERE anum=@anum; RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: UPDATE dbo.patient SET name=@name,address=@address WHERE pid=@pid; RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
BodyScript
Property.Value: UPDATE dbo.prescription SET prescription=@prescription WHERE pid=@pid; RETURN 0

Property.Name: HeaderContents
QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT * FROM [doctor]

Property.Name: HeaderContents
Property.Value: CREATE VIEW [dbo].[view_doc_rev_grp] AS

Property.Name: QueryScript
Property.Value: SELECT did,SUM(charge) as yearrev FROM dbo.appointment GROUP BY did

Property.Value:

AS
